Uptown Mogul

Film and video direction and production

NYC-based film and video production companyUptown Mogul needed a website to showcase their work, services and equipment for rent.

Website Architecture, User Experience and Design

Craig Webb Art proposed a website architecture with a video-gallery and equipment rental page. The video gallery features JavaScript pop-up iframe pages for each video.

The cleanly elegant WordPress mobile-first responsive website theme is designed to convey the dedication and attention to detail that Uptown Mogul imbues into their craft.

The mobile-first responsive custom WordPress theme is designed and built using SASS, JavaScript, PHP and HTML.
